    Adapter for displaying chat messages in a RecyclerView.

    CreateGroupActivity
    Activity responsible for creating a new messaging group.
    FriendsActivity
    Activity that displays a list of users which can be added to a group.
    FriendsAdapter
    RecyclerView adapter used to display a list of users that can be added to a messaging group.
    FriendsAdapter.FriendViewHolder
    ViewHolder class that holds references to the views used to display a user's information.
    FriendsAdapter.OnUserClickListener
    Listener interface for handling user click events.
    GeneralMessageViewerActivity
    Activity responsible for displaying the general message viewer and managing navigation between major sections of the app using a bottom navigation bar.
    Group
    Represents a chat group with an identifier and a name.
    GroupListActivity
    Activity responsible for displaying all message groups that the currently logged-in user belongs to.
    GroupListAdapter
    RecyclerView adapter responsible for displaying a list of chat groups that a user belongs to.
    GroupListAdapter.GroupClickListener
    Callback interface for handling group click events.
    GroupListAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder used to represent a single group item.
    Message
    Represents a single chat message within a group conversation.
    MessageAdapter
    RecyclerView Adapter for displaying chat messages.
    MessageAdapter.MessageViewHolder
    ViewHolder for chat message items.
    MessageModel
    Represents a single chat message.
    MessagesActivity
    Activity for displaying and sending messages within a group chat.
